[h1]Classico de PC que Merece Ser Relembrado[/h1]

Left 4 Dead é um Game em 1ª Pessoa de Ação e Survival Zombie Desenvolvido e Distribuído Pela Valve Lançado em 2008

[b]História do Game:[/b]
O jogo é protagonizado Por 4 personagens amados pelo publico, Bill: Um veterano na guerra,Francis: Um motociclista, Louis: Um Vendedor de Eletrodoméstico, Zoey: uma estudante comum, No mundo desse Grande jogo Á 5 Espécies: Os Hunters Que São Extremamente Rápidos e Ágeis, Boomer que é Um Zumbi Obeso que Joga uma Lava Verde que Faz Todos os Infectados Irem Até Você, Smoker que Tem Uma Língua Gigante e Agarra Você, Tank que São Muito Fortes e Rápidos, Witch que é uma Mulher Magra que Se Você Incomodar ela Você Se Ferra.

[b]Mecânicas: [/b]
Left 4 Dead Tem a Mesma Engine de Half Life 2, que era umas das Engines mais Poderosas da Época, Seu Gráfico era meio Ultrapassado Mas Não Importava Muito, A Quantidade de Armas Era Pouco mas Não atrapalhava em Nada, Sua Física era Muito Bom e A Movimentação dos Personagens Era Bem feita pra Época! E a Ambientação era Excelente Por Causa que o Nível de Detalhe das Fases Era Muito Grande, E Outra Coisa que É Muito Elogiada é a Mira que é Bastante Precisa e Bem Intuitiva.

[b]Considerações Finais:[/b]
Left 4 Dead é um Clássico que Marcou Época, O Multiplayer do Game Ainda é Muito Jogado, É o Meu Favorito dos 2 Games Lançados Pela Valve.

You're better off buying Left 4 Dead 2. This is Left 4 Dead 2 with less content & a more dramatic atmosphere. The music is better in this game, but there's less maps, less infected, less survivors, less guns, and no steam workshop stuff. Not a bad game, but not better than Left 4 Dead 2.

Left 4 Dead is one of the best Co-op games available, even years after it's release. It is fast, frantic, and most important, it's fun. Pick it up, and let's get a game going!

Un gran juego, para pasar largas horas de diversión solo o con tus amistades. Realmente la cooperación y el trabajo en equipo es importante para lograr pasar las campañas sin complicaciones.

Tiene una cantidad de armas no muy elevada pero son muy eficientes infectados por todos lados con una IA bastante convincente muchas balas, explosiones y unos personajes listos para una batalla contra la horda.

El juego cuenta con 5 tipos de armas: Pistolas , Escopetas de correa y semiautomática , Rifle de asalto (M16) , subfusil (Uzi) y un fusil de precisión.

Campaña: Duración muy breve 4-6 horas de juego siendo medio bueno y con compañeros mucho menos e mas fácil eso si muy intenso e cargado de infectados , cuatro niveles cada uno de ellos con un final muy destacado por el numero de zombis en los que se basa en aguantar hasta el final

Supervivencia: Este modo de juego posee de 25 a 30 mapas de la campaña para alargar la jugabilidad del juego ampliamente con un modo que como en la campaña pulsamos un botón y viene la horda pero estaremos preparados con bombas , armas , bombonas de butano o de gasolina ,etc .Este modo es bastante bueno para el cooperativo por su medallas por tiempo aguantado es adictivo.

Enfrentamiento: 4 jugadores son infectados y cuatro humanos en este modo los supervivientes deben sobrevivir como en la campaña y los jugadores infectados deben eliminarlos jugando como infectados especiales como el tank o boomer ,etc.

以前大学的时候和舍友们一起联机玩，很有感觉，至今记忆深刻。hunter，smoker，witch，tank，boomer，这些精英丧尸自带技能真的很爽，游戏整体操作性强，可以换不同武器，可以各种枪，或者刀，电锯，斧子等武器，让你体验不同方式打丧尸的乐趣，每次快要到安全屋时成群的丧尸蜂拥而至，气氛很紧张。最近又入手了联机体验 回味了下，不过手残了，枪法也生疏，呵呵 。这游戏促销只要6元几乎白送，真心太划算了，物美价廉，点赞！

IMPORTANT NOTE: Do NOT buy this game!
Allow me to explain why. All of the content from this game, all levels and characters etc, are part of Left 4 Dead 2 by default. This means buying this one is redundant. Just save the money and buy the sequel so you can play them both at the same time plus have the added benefit of the new monsters you get to fight from the sequel.

~~~~~~~~~
2019 EDIT:
After countless people explaining the differences between the games, do yourself a favor and research these two great titles. I am sure there is a video out there showcasing how they are different. I personally feel that this game is redundant however many disagree and would rather play the original content on the original game only, not on Left 4 Dead 2. You should figure out which is best for you before buying.

With that being said, keep in mind these games are getting old and frequently go on sale for dirt cheap prices. I think you can sometimes even get both Left 4 Dead titles for about $5 total which is worth it. Then you can install and play both and decide for yourself. All that matters is that they get played because they are terrific and shouldn't be forgotten.
~~~~~~~~~

Review:
As for the game itself, I highly recommend this title. This is teamwork at its best. You literally can't get through this game by yourself. Sure, you can play single player mode just fine since the AI is decent but I mean you can't play ALONE as the game will inevitably put you into certain scenarios where you will get pinned down and die without someone there to save you. So either another player or an AI will have to help you up or it's game over.

The gunplay is fast and furious. The zombies are fast and attack in hordes so you can't really survive long by standing in one place.

There isn't too much story but with this type of game you really don't need story. Just fight your way from one obstacle to the next until you finish the game. Terrific good time.

⠀어떻게 보면 4인 코옵 게임의 조상격이라 할 수 있는 [b]《죽음 속에 남겨진 4명》[/b]이다. 2008년에 출시가 되었고, 나는 지금에서야 이 게임을 플레이했다. 그게 무엇을 의미하는 지 아는가? 멀티를 할 수 없다는 뜻이다. 분명 접속자가 200명 넘게 있다고 표시는 되지만, 한국에서 스팀을 하는 우리들은 절대 멀티방을 볼 수가 없을 것이다. 

⠀그나마 같이할 친구가 있는 사람은 다행이다. 같이할 친구가 전혀 없는 나 같은 사람은 일단 대전모드를 플레이할 수도 없다. 따라서 대전모드 도전과제는 여러 커뮤니티를 돌아다니며 모르는 사람에게 도와달라고(부족한 영어를 쥐어짜내며) 부탁해야 한다. 이러한 문제로 인해 지금은 싱글 플레이만 즐기고 있다. 솔직히 재미는 있다. 혼자서 해도 상당히 재밌는 듯.

⠀그러나 싱글 플레이의 컨텐츠는 너무 빨리 소모된다. 그래서 쉽게 질린다. 필자 역시 그런 상황에 놓여있다. 이런 나에게 대전모드를 구경시켜줄 파트너는 과연 언제쯤 나타날까? 
⠀오늘도 내 옆에는 AI가 함께한다. 함께 있어도 외롭다. 눈물을 훔치며, 나는 또 남은 도전과제를 위해 좀비들을 조각내러 간다.

Almost 10 years old and still one of the greatest co-op shooters of all time.  

I think the best thing about it is that it's elegant in its simplicity, meaning four friends who are halfway decent at shooters can jump right in, and have a great time.  

The gameplay emphasizes teamwork in a way not many other games manage to.  Players each carry a very limited amount of equipment, so they need to work together to cover each other's weaknesses, rather than a single player having a gun for every situation, and enough healing to last them the whole game.  Players also frequently need to rescue each other from the grasp of heavily mutated "special infected" so the party needs to stick together, rather than everyone running off to kill things as fast as they can.

Another cool feature in this game that I haven't seen in other games is the invisible AI controlled "director" that monitors the party's progress, and decides when and where to spawn enemies and items.  This alows you to play the same maps over and over with a slightly different experience each time, and automatically adjusts the difficulty based on how well the party is doing.  

Audio is optimized for headphones, and the slight differences between the left and right channels let you judge which direction sounds are coming from.  That's nice attention to detail that a lot of newer games didn't bother to get right.

Unfortunately this one has a relatively small multiplayer community, compared to its sequel, and no steam workshop.  I think this is the slightly better of the two games, but the sequel offers more replayability.

Originally played this on the Xbox 360 and loved it. Picked it up on steam and had a blast. There really isn't much wrong with this game. Gool ole' zombie killing in its simplest form. Took me about 11 hours to complete all the campaigns which is actually quite long for an FPS game. 8/10
